os.fullpath: Operating System :: Other Operating Systems :: RISC OS

name: plutoemail
short_description:
Pluto is an email and newsgroup reader for the RISC OS operating system (http://www.riscosopen.org/).

Pluto was developed by Jonathan Duddington from 1997 to 2004.

From Version 3.06b Pluto has been compiled to be suitable for newer ARM processors such as the ARMv6 Raspberry Pi and ARMv7 used in the Beagleboard and Pandaboard.  Version 3.06b was mostly unchanged except for the speech interface which was updated for the latest version of eSpeak (http://espeak.sourceforge.net), the RISC OS version of eSpeak is included in the Pluto download.

After it was released under GPLv3, Pluto has had some more improvements made. The source for all these changes is hosted here, with the agreement of the original author, Jonathan Duddington, to who thanks are due.
 
For details of all updates from v3.06b to the very latest version, please see the Pluto Web Site (http://www.avisoft.f9.co.uk/pluto/).
summary: Email reader for RISC OS operating system.
